.form-element__sumbit-arrow{background-color:#c7017f}.theme-manage.callout .form-element__sumbit .form-element__sumbit-arrow:after,.theme-manage.content-box .form-element__sumbit      <div class="container">
      <div class="row clearfix">
       <div class="col-xs-12">
        <div class="content-box content-box--white-bg theme-residential content-box--inner-border">
         <div class="row">
          <div class="col-sm-6 js-match-height">
           <div class="card ">
            <div class="card__content">
             <h3 class="card__title">
              Find a home to rent
             </h3>
             <p>
              Find your new home, with affordable rent and quality service.
             </p>
            </div>
            <div class="card__base">
             <div class="validation-summary-valid" data-valmsg-summary="true">
              <ul>
               <li style="display:none">
               </li>
              </ul>
             </div>
             <form action="/" autocomplete="off" enctype="multipart/form-data" method="post">
              <label class="visuallyhidden" for="Location">
               Location
              </label>
              <input class="form-element" data-val="true" data-val-required="The Location field is required." id="Location" name="Location" placeholder="Enter postcode" type="text" value=""/>
              <div class="form-element__sumbit">
               <input data-val="true" data-val-number="The field Max Distance (miles) must be a number." data-val-required="The Max Distance (miles) field is required." id="Distance" name="Distance" type="hidden" value="50"/>
               <input data-val="true" data-val-number="The field Minimum Bedrooms must be a number." data-val-required="The Minimum Bedrooms field is required." id="MinimumBedrooms" name="MinimumBedrooms" type="hidden" value="1"/>
               <input data-val="true" data-val-number="The field Max Price () must be a number." data-val-required="The Max Price () field is required." id="MaximumPrice" name="MaximumPrice" type="hidden" value="9999"/>
               <input class="form-element" name="Homes to Rent" type="submit" value="Find your new home"/>
               <span class="form-element__sumbit-arrow">
               </span>
              </div>
              <input name="ufprt" type="hidden" value=""/>
             </form>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="col-sm-6 js-match-height">
           <div class="card card__2-col ">
            <div class="row">
             <div class="col-sm-12">
              <h3 class="card__title">
               Existing customers
              </h3>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
             <div class="col-sm-6">
              <div class="card__content">
               <p>
                <a href="https://my.placesforpeople.co.uk">
                 Log in to your account
                </a>
                to view your rent balance, make a payment, report a repair or submit an enquiry.
               </p>
               <p>
                <strong>
                 Not yet registered?
                </strong>
                <br/>
                <a href="https://my.placesforpeople.co.uk/signup.aspx">
                 Sign up now
                </a>
                to manage your home.
               </p>
              </div>
              <div class="card__base">
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="col-sm-6">
              <div class="card__content">
               <a class="btn btn--point" href="/homes-to-rent/help-and-support/rent/make-a-payment/" target="_self">
                <span class="btn__text">
                 Make a payment
                </span>
                <span class="btn--point__arrow">
                </span>
               </a>
               <a class="btn btn--point" href="/homes-to-rent/help-and-support/repairs/" target="_self">
                <span class="btn__text">
                 Report a repair
                </span>
                <span class="btn--point__arrow">
                </span>
               </a>
               <a class="btn btn--point" href="/homes-to-rent/help-and-support/" target="_self">
                <span class="btn__text">
                 Help and support
                </span>
                <span class="btn--point__arrow">
                </span>
               </a>
               <p>
               </p>
              </div>
              <div class="card__base">
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="grey-area">
     <div class="container">

            <div class="card__content">
             <h3 class="card__title">
              Homes to buy
             </h3>
             <p>
              Our award-winning homes combine quality, style and innovation - whether it's an exciting city centre apartment, a well-designed family home or a place to enjoy retirement.

                <p>
                 Affordable cottage apartments in the seaside town of North Berwick.
                </p>
               </div>
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="carousel__slide">
             <div class="carousel__inner">
              <a href="/homes-to-buy/our-developments/thanks/">
               <div class="carousel__content">
                <div class="carousel__title-holder">
                 <p class="carousel__title">
                  Thanks
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="grey-area">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="row clearfix">
       <div class="col-sm-8 js-match-height">
        <div class="content-box content-box--white-bg theme-finance ">
         <div class="card card__2-col card__2-col--image theme-finance">
          <div class="card-split">
           <div class="card__content">
            <h3 class="card__title">
             Finance
            </h3>
            <p>
             <span>
              We provide innovative finance products for a broad range of customers, including those often excluded by conventional providers. Our
              <a data-udi="umb://document/aceadb2b5cc6450bbd625d3b170bc159" href="/finance/loans/" title="Loans">
               loans
              </a>
              ,
              <a data-udi="umb://document/cac4629f2c0e45d5aaf4687d96730913" href="/finance/mortgages/" title="Mortgages">
               mortgages
              </a>
              and
              <a data-udi="umb://document/8349c5ea346a433ca832328321059412" href="/finance/insurance/" title="Insurance">
               insurance
              </a>
              products are simple to access and come with expert advice.
             </span>
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="card__base">
            <a class="btn btn--inline btn--point" href="/finance/">
             <span class="btn__text">
              More about finance
             </span>
             <span class="btn--point__arrow">
             </span>
            </a>
           </div>
          </div>

            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="col-sm-4 js-match-height">

          <div class="card__content">
           <h3 class="card__title">
            Leisure
           </h3>
           <p>

           </p>
          </div>

    <div class="grey-area">
     <div class="banner banner--content default">
      <div class="container">
       <div class="banner__holder">
        <div class="banner__content">
         <h2 class="h1 banner__content-title">
          Placemaking
         </h2>
         <p>
          Our vision is to create places that work for everyone.
         </p>
         <p>
          To this end, we don't just build houses, we create and manage places, and the places we make stand the test of time, because with 50 years' experience in placemaking, we know what makes communities thrive.
         </p>
         <a class="btn btn--point" href="/placemaking/">
          <span class="btn__text">
           Find out more
          </span>
          <span class="btn--point__arrow">
          </span>
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="banner__media">
         <img alt="placemaking-smithsdock.jpg" src="/media/1522/placemaking-smithsdock.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=1440&amp;upscale=false&amp;rnd=131647428350000000"/>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <section class="section-spacer">
     <div class="container content-box--inner-border">
      <div class="row">
       <div class="col-sm-8">
        <p class="carousel__title">
         Latest news
        </p>
        <div class="carousel carousel--article js-article-carousel">
         <div class="carousel__slide">
          <div class="carousel__inner">
           <div class="carousel__content">
            <p class="carousel__date">
             19 Jun 18
            </p>
            <h3 class="carousel__article-title">
             PfP Capital announces intention to launch a fund in partnership with the Scottish Government
            </h3>
            <p>
             PfP Capital, our fund management business, has announced that it intends to launch a new fund in partnership with the Scottish Government to invest in mid-market rent (MMR) properties throughout Scotland.
            </p>
            <a class="btn btn--point" href="/about-us/news/2018/pfp-capital-announces-intention-to-launch-a-fund-in-partnership-with-the-scottish-government/">
             <span class="btn__text">
              Find out more
             </span>
             <span class="btn--point__arrow">
             </span>
            </a>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="carousel__slide">
          <div class="carousel__inner">
           <div class="carousel__content">
            <p class="carousel__date">
             14 Jun 18
            </p>
            <h3 class="carousel__article-title">
             Doing more, together
            </h3>
            <p>
             At Places for People, weve been in the business of placemaking for decades. During that time weve developed a huge wealth of expertise on what communities want to thrive  but were also always looking ahead.
            </p>
            <p>
            </p>
            <a class="btn btn--point" href="/about-us/news/comment-opinion/doing-more-together/">
             <span class="btn__text">
              Find out more
             </span>
             <span class="btn--point__arrow">
             </span>
            </a>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

          <div class="carousel__inner">
           <div class="carousel__content">
            <p class="carousel__date">
             14 Jun 18
            </p>

             More awards success for Places for People
            </h3>
            <p>
             Our awards success continues with a win and commendation at the Planning Awards.
            </p>
            <a class="btn btn--point" href="/about-us/news/2018/more-awards-success-for-places-for-people/">
             <span class="btn__text">
              Find out more
             </span>
             <span class="btn--point__arrow">
             </span>
            </a>

            <p class="carousel__date">
             13 Jun 18
            </p>
            <h3 class="carousel__article-title">
             Places for People joins national campaign to tackle domestic abuse
            </h3>
            <p>
             Places for Peoples Affordable Housing companies have signed up to a new national campaign to help tackle domestic abuse.
            </p>
            <a class="btn btn--point" href="/about-us/news/2018/places-for-people-joins-national-campaign-to-tackle-domestic-abuse/">

            </a>
           </div>
